bio:
Revus Sarvani is a Dunmer general goods merchant. He can be found south-west of the Sun Stone with his Silt Strider, Dusty.
He found the cocoon of Dusty in a small cave in Vvardenfell after the eruption of the Red Mountain wiped out most of her species. He raised her into an adult, but mentions she has not been in traveling condition for a while, and that he is staying with her until she passes away.
name: Revus Sarvani
